name: ts-refactor
description: TypeScript code refactor interactive CLI tool

scripts.prettier: ts-node src/cli/cliMain.ts organizeImports "src/**" "spec/**/*Spec.ts*" --dontAsk && npx prettier  --write --arrow-parens avoid --parser typescript --use-tabs false --no-semi true --single-quote true --tab-width 2 --trailing-comma none --end-of-line lf --prose-wrap preserve --print-width 120  --jsx-bracket-same-line true "src/**/*.ts*" "spec/**/*Spec.ts*"
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run prettier && npm run build && npm test

author: Sebastian Gurin
